testcase.name: Duplicate linkbase roleRef and duplicate arcroleRefs
testcase.description: 3.5.2.4.5 and 3.5.2.5.5 linkbase roleRef and arcroleRef elements.

variation.name: 215-01 duplicate roleRef elements in calculation linkbase
variation.description: 215-01-calculation.xml contains two role references to the same URI, INVALID
